name: Solidity Basics
description: Introduction to Solidity programming for writing smart contracts on Ethereum and EVM-compatible blockchains.

cards.title: Introduction to Solidity
cards.description: Understanding Solidity's role in blockchain development and its fundamental syntax.
cards.bulletpoints: Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), Solidity syntax, contract deployment
cards.summaryText: Introduce how Solidity targets the EVM, review core syntax conventions, and outline the deployment flow for a basic contract.

cards.title: Solidity Data Types & Variables
cards.description: Exploring Solidity's primitive and complex data types.
cards.bulletpoints: uint, int, string, bytes, arrays, mappings, structs
cards.summaryText: List key primitive and reference types, explain when to use arrays versus mappings, and show how structs bundle related fields.

cards.title: Functions, Modifiers, and Events
cards.description: Learning how to define functions, use modifiers, and trigger events.
cards.bulletpoints: Function visibility, function modifiers, event logging
cards.summaryText: Clarify visibility keywords, demonstrate modifiers enforcing rules, and connect event emissions to off-chain listeners.
